titleInfo.title: PROVIDING FOR CONSIDERATION OF H.R. 7, NO TAXPAYER FUNDING FOR ABORTION AND ABORTION INSURANCE FULL DISCLOSURE ACT OF 2017

extension.searchTitle: PROVIDING FOR CONSIDERATION OF H.R. 7, NO TAXPAYER FUNDING FOR ABORTION AND ABORTION INSURANCE FULL DISCLOSURE ACT OF 2017; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 13

congVote.result: So the previous question was ordered.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory1: No Taxpayer Funding for Abortion and Abortion Insurance Full Disclosure Act of 2017
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House passed H.R. 7, to prohibit taxpayer funded abortions, by a recorded vote of 238 ayes to 183 noes, Roll No. 65.<P/>Rejected the Schakowsky motion to recommit the bill to the Committee on Energy and Commerce with instructions to report the same back to the House forthwith with an amendment, by a yea-and-nay vote of 187 yeas to 235 nays, Roll No. 64.<P/>H. Res. 55, the rule providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 7) was agreed to by a recorded vote of 236 ayes to 183 noes, Roll No. 63, after the previous question was ordered by a yea-and-nay vote of 233 yeas to 187 nays, Roll No. 62.

congVote.result: So the resolution was agreed to.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory1: No Taxpayer Funding for Abortion and Abortion Insurance Full Disclosure Act of 2017
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House passed H.R. 7, to prohibit taxpayer funded abortions, by a recorded vote of 238 ayes to 183 noes, Roll No. 65.<P/>Rejected the Schakowsky motion to recommit the bill to the Committee on Energy and Commerce with instructions to report the same back to the House forthwith with an amendment, by a yea-and-nay vote of 187 yeas to 235 nays, Roll No. 64.<P/>H. Res. 55, the rule providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 7) was agreed to by a recorded vote of 236 ayes to 183 noes, Roll No. 63, after the previous question was ordered by a yea-and-nay vote of 233 yeas to 187 nays, Roll No. 62.

congVote.result: So the motion to recommit was rejected.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory1: No Taxpayer Funding for Abortion and Abortion Insurance Full Disclosure Act of 2017
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House passed H.R. 7, to prohibit taxpayer funded abortions, by a recorded vote of 238 ayes to 183 noes, Roll No. 65.<P/>Rejected the Schakowsky motion to recommit the bill to the Committee on Energy and Commerce with instructions to report the same back to the House forthwith with an amendment, by a yea-and-nay vote of 187 yeas to 235 nays, Roll No. 64.

congVote.dailyDigestCategory1: No Taxpayer Funding for Abortion and Abortion Insurance Full Disclosure Act of 2017
No Taxpayer Funding for Abortion and Abortion Insurance Full Disclosure Act of 2017
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House passed H.R. 7, to prohibit taxpayer funded abortions, by a recorded vote of 238 ayes to 183 noes, Roll No. 65.

The House passed H.R. 7, to prohibit taxpayer funded abortions, by a recorded vote of 238 ayes to 183 noes, Roll No. 65.<P/>Rejected the Schakowsky motion to recommit the bill to the Committee on Energy and Commerce with instructions to report the same back to the House forthwith with an amendment, by a yea-and-nay vote of 187 yeas to 235 nays, Roll No. 64.
